 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: namespace Instagram;
 4: 
 5: use Instagram\Http\Clients\GuzzleAdapter;
 6: use Instagram\Http\Middleware\AuthMiddleware;
 7: use Instagram\Http\Sessions\NativeSessionStore;
 8: use Noodlehaus\AbstractConfig;
 9: 
10: /**
11:  * Stores the application configuration.
12:  *
13:  * @package    Instagram
14:  * @author     Hassan Khan <contact@hassankhan.me>
15:  * @link       https://github.com/hassankhan/instagram-sdk
16:  * @license    MIT
17:  */
18: class Config extends AbstractConfig
19: {
20:     /**
21:      * Constructor method and sets default options, if any
22:      *
23:      * @param array $data
24:      */
25:     public function __construct(array $data)
26:     {
27:         $filteredData = array_filter(array_merge($this->getDefaults(), $data));
28:         parent::__construct($filteredData);
29:     }
30: 
31:     /**
32:      * {@inheritDoc}
33:      */
34:     protected function getDefaults()
35:     {
36:         return [
37:             'base_uri'      => 'https://api.instagram.com/v1/',
38:             'client_id'     => '',
39:             'client_secret' => '',
40:             'access_token'  => null,
41:             'redirect_url'  => '',
42:             'session_store' => NativeSessionStore::class,
43:             'http_adapter'  => GuzzleAdapter::class,
44:             'middleware'    => [
45:                 'auth'   => AuthMiddleware::class,
46:             ],
47:         ];
48:     }
49: }
